opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendant's motion to remand this case to the Superior Court for hearing on defendant's application for bail pending appeal is granted. The record herein shall be returned to this court forthwith upon the conclusion of said hearing.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Janice M. Weisfeld, Paula Rosin, Mary E. Levesque, John A. MacFadyen III, Asst. Public Defenders, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Francis E. LACHAPPELLE.
No. 79-34-C.A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Feb. 21, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., for plaintiff.
Janice M. Weisfeld, Paula Rosin, Mary E. Levesque, John A. MacFadyen III, Asst. Public Defenders, for defendant.
